channel.title: Client amour showwing not working
channel.description:
Hello, the title is weird but i explain. I got galkons-base as basic client You can click this tabs attack-stats-quest-invetory-equip-prayer magic But equip dont work?
If i press it i get a error: [code]Exception in thread "Thread-3" java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 64761 at Class8.method198(Class8.java:198) at Class8.method200(Class8.java:2542) at client.method105(client.java:7979) at client.method36(client.java:1410) at client.method102(client.java:7681) at client.method9(client.java:8558) at Applet_Sub1.run(Applet_Sub1.java:122) at client.run(client.java:4266) at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:619)[/code]
How to fix this?
[br][br][size=1]Posted on: September 19, 2008, 07:44:42 am[/size][hr]Sorry its the server not the client

item.title: Client amour showwing not working
item.dc:creator: @00niels00 00niels00
item.description:
@00niels00 wrote:

Hello, the title is weird but i explain.
I got galkons-base as basic client
You can click this tabs
attack-stats-quest-invetory-equip-prayer magic
But equip dont work?

If i press it i get a error:

Exception in thread "Thread-3" java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 64761 at Class8.method198(Class8.java:198) at Class8.method200(Class8.java:2542) at client.method105(client.java:7979) at client.method36(client.java:1410) at client.method102(client.java:7681) at client.method9(client.java:8558) at Applet_Sub1.run(Applet_Sub1.java:122) at client.run(client.java:4266) at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:619)

How to fix this?

[br][br][size=1]Posted on: September 19, 2008, 07:44:42 am[/size][hr]Sorry its the server not the client
